original_title: Hittin' the Trail for Hallelujah Land
overview: Piggy and Fluffy have adventures on a riverboat and Uncle Tom is chased by skeletons promising to take him to Hallelujah Land. One of the "Censored 11" banned from TV syndication by United Artists in 1968 for racist stereotyping.
title: Hittin' the Trail for Hallelujah Land
